GSP29vytrkt2u:4773: viśeṣaṇajñānatayā hetubhūtāyā dhārāvāhikaprathamādibuddherviṣayo yaḥ saṃsargaḥ tatpratiyogisaṃsargasya dvitīyādibuddhāvabhānāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4778: hetubhūtasya padārthajñānasya viṣa 1 yo jātivyaktyorvaiśiṣṭyarūpo yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tatsaṃsargasya śābdapramāyāmabhānāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4784: ayaṃ ghaṭa ityādidhārāvāhikasthale ghaṭapaṭatva 3 saṃsarga ityarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4793: anyathā parvato vahnisaṃyogavānityeva dhīḥ syānna tu vahnimānitīti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4800: etena yathā pratyakṣe viśiṣṭajñāne viśeṣyendriyasannikarṣo viśeṣyabhā 1 nasāmagrī,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4803: taditarā tu dhīrviśeṣaṇabhā 4 nasāmagrī 5 ti sāmagrīdvayasanniviṣṭādasaṃsargāgrahādeva saṃsargabhāna,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4809: nirvikalpakādirūpaṃ ghaṭatvādiviśeṣaṇajñānaṃ tu ghaṭatvādiviśeṣaṇabhānasāmagrī vaiśiṣṭyabhāvanasāmagrī tu 6 sāmagrīdvayasahitā 7 tadubhayasaṃsargāgraharūpaiva,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4827: manmate pratyakṣe 'pi viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyābhyāmiva tatsaṃsargeṇāpīndriyapratyāsatterhetutvenehāpi pratyāsattisthānīyasya śaktijñānsayā 1 pyanvayāṃśe 'pyapekṣitatvācca//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4828: kiṃ ca pramāṇāntare 'pi pratyakṣamaryādānusaraṇasyāvaśakatve 'numitāvapi pakṣarūpaviśeṣyajñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4830: anumitiśābdajñāne prati liṅgaśabdayorjñānaṃ vyāptiśaktyojñānaṃ ca heturna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4837: yadyapi siddhānte ghaṭādau taddharmāṇāṃ ghaṭādinā na saṃsargaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4839: tathāpi daṇḍītyādau daṇḍadevadattasaṃyogopagamena daṇḍadevadattābhyāmiva tadubhayasaṃyogenāpīndriyasya saṃyogarūpapratyāsatteraṅgīkārāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4842: nanu nyāyamate prāguktasāmagrīdvayasahitādasaṃsargāgrahādeva pratyakṣasthala iva saṃsargāgrahopapattau nādhikakalpanāvasara ityata āha-- kiṃ ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4858: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau ghoṣatīrādyanvaye vyabhicāranirāsāya hetau vinetyantoktiḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4865: nanu yaduktaṃ anvayaḥ padaśakyaḥ vṛtyantaraṃ vinā śābdatvātpadārthavaditi/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4871: eteneti// yadvā śābdatvādityasiddhaṃ anvayabodhasya padārthakaraṇakatvāt śabdānuvidhānasyānyatropakṣayāditi matāntaraṃ cānūdya nirāha-- eteneti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4879: bodhakaṃ smṛta 1 padārtha eva tu tadbodhaka iti bhāṭṭamatamapāstam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4883: tasyātītānāgatādirūpatvena phalabhūtamanvayānubhavaṃ vyāpārā 3 bhimatāṃ padārthasmṛtiṃ ca prati kāraṇatvasyaivāsaṃbhavena tadviśeṣasya karaṇatvasya dūrāpāstatvācca/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4886: “padārthastanmatirvā syāditi“bhāṭṭokternivyāpārasya kathaṃ karaṇatetyata uktaṃ smṛta iti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4888: tairapi padārthānāmanvayabodhakatvaṃ kvāpyanupalabdhaṃ tāvatkalpanīyameveti sudhorkti hṛdi kṛtvā'ha -- evaṃ hīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4921: tajjanyatve sati tajjanyajanakasyaivendriyasannikarṣādau vyāpāratvadarśanādiha ca śaktismṛteḥ padārthasmṛtipūrvabhāvanitvena tadajanyatvāditi bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4923: evaṃ ca nirvyāpāramapi smaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4924: smaraṇavyāpārakaṃ mana evavāstu karaṇamityato doṣāntaramāha -- vyutpattīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4925: śabdasyaiva kāraṇatvagrahaṇācca na padārthasmṛtiranvayabodhaṃ prati kāraṇamityanuṣaṅgaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4927: na ca śabdenāyamartho jñāyata ityanubhavavirodhānna tyāgo yukta iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4930: śabdaguṇakamākāśamityādāvākāśe ākāśapadaśaktigrahahīnasyāpyākāśasya śabdamātraṃ prati kāraṇatvādākāśamiti padaṃ 6 pa3ti
GSP29vytrkt2u:4942: na ca -- padaṃ vināpi padārthajñānamātrāt kāvyādimūlānvayabodhadarśanādveṣādiśravaṇānantaraṃ śvetāśvo 2 dhāvatīti dhīdarśanācca,
GSP29vytrkt2u:4946: padārthasmṛteḥ karaṇatve maṇyuktaṃ doṣāntaraṃ cāha-- ghaṭa iti padaviśeṣeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4953: padaṃ vināpīti kṛtacodyasya maṇyuktameva samādhiṃ spaṣṭhamāha -- yogajeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4960: manasa eva kāvyādimūlasaṃsargānubhave utprekṣāsahakṛtasya tattadarthasmṛtivyāpārakasya manasa eva kāraṇatvāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4966: mama tu ayaṃ kālāgaruvahnimān nīlasurabhidhūmavatvāditivadayaṃ śveto dhāvadaśvo heṣākhuraniṣpeṣavatvādityanumānena /
GSP29vytrkt2u:4975: śveta iti pakṣaḥ dhāvadaśva iti sādhyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4979: uktaṃ ca maṇikṛtāpi śvetośvo dhāvatīti dhīstu liṅgajeti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:4980: nanvevaṃ vākye padārthasmaraṇamabhyupetya tasyoktadiśā nirvyāpāratvādinānvayabodhaṃ pratyakaraṇatvoktau nyāyamata iva 4
GSP29vytrkt2u:4988: vastutastu manmate vākyasthapadajñā 1 nānvayānubhavayormadhye padārthasmṛtireva nāsti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:4999: nanu vākye padārthānsmarāmītyanuvyavasāyābhāve 'pi vākyatvaṃ padaṃ padārthasmārakaṃ padatvādekaikaśaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5001: . asahāyapadatvamupādhīriti bhāvena sudhoktameva samādhimāha-- kiṃ tāvatetyādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5002: astu ko doṣa ityata āha-- tathātva iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5010: indriyaliṅgābhyāṃ sannikarṣavyāptyoriva śabedanāpi śakteranubhavarūpe 1 svaphale janayitavya eva svaviṣayeṇa saha saṃbandhatvenāna 2 pekṣitatvācca//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5015_0: - na tu saṃskāratvena tathātvena tajjanyasyaiva smṛtitvaṃ śabdetvavākyasthala iva
GSP29vytrkt2u:5015_1: vākyasthale 'pi śaktitvena śakteḥ padārthopasthitihetutvātsmṛtitvameva yuktamityata āha-- indriyeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5016_0: indriyaliṅgābhyasvaviṣaye jñāne janayitavye tathākramaṃ sannikarṣavyāptyoryathā saṃbandhatvenāpekṣitatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5016_1: tathā vākya 4 smṛtaśabdenāpi svārthagocarānubhave janayitavye śakteḥ saṃbandhatvenaivāpekṣitatvena
GSP29vytrkt2u:5017: nanu śabda eva śakteḥ smārakatvaniyamo nānyatreti manvānaṃ pratyāha vyutpattīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5019: na caivaṃ kevalapadasyāpi smārakatvaṃ na syāditi vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5021: nanu tu smārakatvenāgṛhītāyāḥ śakteravākyasthale kathaṃ smārakatvāmityatastatra śakterna smārakatvaṃ kiṃ tu
GSP29vytrkt2u:5039: smārakatvena sāhacaryaniyamo nāvaśyaka iti sūcanāya hastineti dṛṣṭantoktiḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5040: tathā cānanyathāsiddhatvādanubhava eva śakterupayogaḥ svīkārya iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5041_1: ca padārthayoḥ saṃbandhitvātsaṃbandhajñānasya ca saṃbandhijñānapūrvakatvasya ghaṭapaṭasaṃyogādipratyakṣe
GSP29vytrkt2u:5042: tathā ca kathaṃ madhye padārthasmṛtireva netyuktirityata āha-- saṃbandheti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5047: phalamityuktaṃ taddhṛdi kṛtvā śaṅkate -- na caivamiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5061_0: nanu śaktiranvayāṃśe svarūpasatī padārthāṃśe tu jñātopayujyata iti kubjaśaktipakṣe
GSP29vytrkt2u:5061_1: padajñānānvabodhayormadhye śaktijñānaṃ nāstyeveti kathaṃ tasya vyāpāratetyata āha-- svīkṛtā hīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5062: padārthasmṛtyarthaṃ tvayāpyaṅgīkṛtatvādasmābhiścānvayāṃśe 'pi śaktijñānamāvaśyakamiti sādhitatvācca bhavati śaktijñānamavāntaravyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5105: etena -- padārthamātre śaktasya padasya padārtha saṃbandhinyasya 1 ye lakṣaṇaiveti nirastam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5112: yathā pravāhe śaktasya gaṅgāpadasya tatsaṃbandhini tīre lakṣaṇā tatheti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5118: nanu lakṣaṇāpakṣe hastinā hastipaparasmṛteri 6 vetyādinā pūrvoktidiśā śaktiṃ vināpi padārthasmṛtisambhavena padārtheṣvapi śaktirnopayeti lāghavamiti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5122: yā tu sudhāyā“manvayo 7 lakṣyata iti cettarhi padārtheṣu sāhacaryātsmārakatvamātram/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5129: kiṃ caivaṃ“vailā tattīranīrayo“ityānuśāsanātkevala 1 tīre śaktasya velāpadasya kevalamātsarve śaktasya matsarapadasya 2 viśiṣṭe lakṣaṇasaṃbhavena,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5131: evaṃ jātimātre śaktasya gavādipadasya jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktau 3 ca lakṣaṇāsaṃbhavena jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭavyaktau śaktiśca na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5132: yadi ca velādipadasya nīrādau tadviśiṣṭatīrādau ca prayogaprācuryānnīrādyanupapattya 4 nusaṃdhānaṃ vinaiva viśiṣṭapratīteśca na tatra lakṣaṇā ;
GSP29vytrkt2u:5133: tarhi tata evānvasya viśaṣṭepi na lakṣaṇā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:5134: kiṃ ca vācyārthasaṃbandhitayā dhīstha evārthe lakṣaṇā//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5136: anvaye tu lakṣaṇeti padānāṃ na kutrāpyabhidhā 5 vṛttiriti syā“dityuktiḥ svārthān smārayantyanya 6 parāṇi padānīti pūrvaprakṛtamatāntarābhiprāyeti 7 jñātavyam//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5138: ekaikatra śaktasyānyatra tatsambandhini prayogaprācuryasatve lakṣaṇāmupetya śaktyapalāpe satītyarthaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5143: paramukhenaiva hetudvayoktipūrvaṃ samādhiṃ vācayati-- yadi ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5156: api ca pratītānvayānupapatyaiva lakṣaṇeti lakṣaṇātaḥ prāganvaye dhīḥ svīkāryeti kathaṃ lakṣaṇayānvayadhīḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5173: tatra kaḥ padārthaḥ kiṃ jātiruta vyaktirita tatrāha-- padārthastvityādinā -- prakaraṇapañcakena /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5181: anirdhāritayatkiñcidvyakteḥ śakyatve kā vyaktiśśakyetyanadhyavasāyena gāndadyādityādi vākyātpravṛttirna syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5182: sarvasyāḥ pratyekaṃ śakyatve yatra śaktigrahastatraiva śābdadhīḥ syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5187: vyaktya eva vācyā iti paddhatyukteriti bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5197: vyaktau śaktiriti vadatā vaktavyam kimekasyāṃ vyaktāvatha sarvāsu vyaktiṣviti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5198: antyepi kiṃ pratyekaṃ tattadvyaktiṣu pṛthakpṛthakśaktiruta sarvatvena rūpeṇa sarvāsvapi vyaktiṣvekaiva /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5201: ekadā sarvāsāmupasthityayogena pratyekaṃ sarvāsu śaktigrahāyogena kvacideveti vācyatvāditi bhāvaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5203: gāmiti padena sarvagovyaktyupasthityā sarvāsāmapi dānakarmatvapratīteriti bhāvaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5209: tasmācchakyavyaktyanugamāyāśakyavyaktivyāvṛttaye ca sarvaikodāsīnyena viśeṣaṇena vopakṣaṇena vā gotvenāvacchinnā vyaktiḥ śakyati śaktigraho vācyaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5210: tathā ca svata evānyavyāvṛttagotvasya prathamopasthitatvāllaghutvācca nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena jātireva śakyā//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5211: nanu vyaktau śaktyabhāvena kathaṃ śabdāttadvīriti cet/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5215: evaṃ vyaktipakṣe bādhakamuktvā svapakṣamupasaṃhāramukhena sayuktimāha -- tasmāditi//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5228: yattu maṇau prābhākaramatānuvādaprastāve kustatarhi vyaktidhīrityāśaṅkya gopadaṃ hi niyamato jātivyaktī bodhayatītyādinā prābhākaramatamūhitaṃ tanniṣkṛṣyāha-- satyamityādinā//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5234: kiṃ tvagṛhītaśaktikasya 1 bālasyārthābodhātkutra cicchaktijñānaṃ sahakāri kalpanīyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5235: tatra jātyaṃśe śaktijñānasyaiva jātiśaktijñānatvena kāraṇatā kalpyate /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5248: kuta ityato viśiṣṭaśaktijñānatvena kāraṇatāgrāhakakamānābhāvādityāha-- jātyaṃśa iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5251: atha vā jātiśaktijñānājjātidhīrbhavantī vyaktimapi bodhayatītyādinā maṇyukta 5 māha-yadveti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5257: -jātervyaktighaṭitamūrtitvena vyaktimanādāya jātibodhanā 1 śaktā tāmādāyaiva jātiṃ bodhayati/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5258: 2 yathā buddhimaddhetukānumititvena kāryatve 3 buddhimaddhetukavyāpya 4 tvena ca 5 kāraṇatve siddhe kṣityādau kāryatvena hetunā jāyamānānumitirbuddhinityatvamādāya paryavasyati/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5265: kṣityādikaṃ buddhimaddhetukaṃ kāryatvāt ghaṭavaditīśvarānumāne kṣityādiniṣṭhakāryatvahetunā kṣityādeḥ 6 siddhyadbuddhimajjanyatvaṃ nityabuddhimajjanyatvaṃ sidhyati/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5267: loke ghaṭādikārye ca buddhimaddhetukatvagocarānumititvena buddhimajjanyatvavyāpyakāryatvavatvena kāryakāraṇabhāvagraho na nityatvagarbhitabuddhimaddhetukatvānumititvenāpi/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5269: kimanena niyāmakamuktaṃ syādityata āha -- etadeva hīti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5278_0: ucyate -- yena rūpeṇopasthite saṃbandhini yasya saṃbandho gṛhyate tena rūpeṇaikasaṃbandhipratītiraparasaṃbandhinaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5278_1: jñāpayatītyanumityādau kḷpta 1 kāryakāraṇabhāvasāmānyamatikramya sāpagryantakalpanā na yuktā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:5280_0: īśvarānumāne 'pi buddhimajjanyatvānu 2 mitiṃ viśiṣṭavyaktau śabdaśaktimupetyāpi śaktijñānasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:5280_1: jātiśaktijñānatvenaiva jātiviśiṣṭavyaktijñānaṃ prati kāraṇatvaṃ tatra ca tadviśiṣṭatvaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5282: dhūmatvādinā rūpeṇopasthite dhūmādau saṃbandhini yasya saṃbandhaḥ yannirūpitaḥ saṃbandho vahninirūpito vyāptilakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5283: tena rūpeṇa dhūmarūpaikasaṃbandhapratītiḥ vahnilakṣaṇamaparasaṃbandhinaṃ jñāpayatītyanumitisthale hasti hastipādismṛtyādisthale ca kḷptam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5284_0: tathaiva śabdasthale 'pi govadatvena rūpeṇa gopadarūpe saṃbandhinyupasthite gotvaviśiṣṭagovyaktinirūpitaḥ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5284_1: śaktilakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhogṛhīta iti gopadatvena rūpeṇa gopadarūpaikasaṃbandhipratītiraparaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:5285_0: tathā ca gopadajñānatvenaiva gorūpārthajñānatvena ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasaṃbhave jātiviśiṣṭavyaktijñāne
GSP29vytrkt2u:5297: jātiviśiṣṭapyaktiviṣayakaśābdajñānatvena kāryateti viparītaṃ kiṃ na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5299: iti śvokasya jātyanvite svārthe vyaktau śaktiranubhūyate śabdānāṃ ato jātyanvitavya 1 ktyabhidhāyitvaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5302: nanvanyalabhyepi vyaktijñāne vyaktiśaktijñānatvenāpi kāraṇatvakalpane gauravaṃ tulyamevetyata āha-- kiṃ caivamiti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5304: nanu jātervyaktighaṭimūrtitvājjātibhānaṃ vyaktibhānaṃ vinā na yuktam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5305: na tu vyakti bhānaṃ jātiṃ vineti/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5308: nanu vyaktau jāterviśeṣaṇatvānnāgṛhīviśeṣaṇanyāyena jātiśaktijñānatvenaiva hetutvamiti cenna/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5309: vyakterapi jātau viśeṣaṇatvātkramikopastathitisthala eva nāgṛhītetinyāyāvatāreṇa tulyavittivedyajātivyaktisthale tadanavatārācca/.
GSP29vytrkt2u:5312: nāgṛhīteti nyāyamabhyupetyāpabi doṣāntaramāha-- kiṃ ca muṇḍita iti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5321: kiṃ ca muṇḍite gotve na śaktigrahaḥ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:5323: ki tu vyaktyā viśeṣite gotve śaktigraha iti nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyo viparītaḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5324: na ca gotvasya svata eva 1 vilakṣaṇatvātsvataḥ siddhenetaravyāvṛttatvena jñāte gotve śaktigraha iti vācyam/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5327: na ca gotvatvena jñāne gotve śaktigrahaḥ/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5328: gavetarāvṛttitve sati gotvavṛttitvādanyasya 2 gotvatvasyābhāvena gotvatve vyakterdviranupraveśāt//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5331: svata evānyavyāvṛtteti prāguktamāśaṅkya nirāha-- na ceti//
GSP29vytrkt2u:5343: kiṃ caivaṃ tvadabhimatā 1 gaṅgāśabdādestīrādau lakṣaṇā maṇḍapaṃ maṇḍapaśabdasya gṛhaviśeṣasaṃbandhini puruṣe rūḍhipūrvikā lakṣaṇā ca na syāt/
GSP29vytrkt2u:5345: tīrapuruṣau tu lakṣaṇāṃ vinā nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena vā
GSP29vytrkt2u:5347: kiṃ ca vyakteraśakyatve tatra vibhaktyar 2 thānvayo na syāt//

GSP29vytrkt2u:7957: kiṃ caivaṃ nivartakamaniṣṭasādhanatvamapi balavadiṣṭānanubandhitvena viśeṣaṇīyaṃ syāt //

GSP29vytrkt2u:7960_1: pravṛttihetuḥ na tu balavadaniṣṭānanubandhitvena jñānamapi ananubhavāditi samam //

GSP29vytrkt2u:7970: pratibandīkathanasya viśeṣaṇatyāga eva phalamiti paramukhena samādhiṃ vācayitvā samamityāha -- nanviti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:7980: na caivaṃ janakībhūtajñānaṃ vighaṭayata eva pratibandhakatvāttadvighaṭanīyamananubandhitvena 1 jñānaṃ hetuḥ syāditi vācyama /

GSP29vytrkt2u:7988: sākṣādavirodhino jñānasya yatkiñcijjanakajñānaṃ vighaṭayata eva kāryapratibandhakatvam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7990: balavadaniṣṭānubandhitvajñānasya pratibandhakatvānyathānupapatyaiva tadananubandhitvādijñānaṃ kāraṇamityāyātamiti na ca vācyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:7991: sākṣādavirodhino jñānasya yatkiñcijjanakavighaṭakatvenaiva pratibandhakatvopapattau kiṃ janakajñānavighaṭakatveneti jñānaviśeṣaṇeneti bhāvenāha -- pravṛttīti //

GSP29vytrkt2u:7995: svarūpasadbalavadveṣaviṣayaduḥkhājanakatve sati tādṛśecchāviṣayasādhanamiti jñānaṃ pravartakamiti nirgalitortha iti pakṣadharoktamāśaṅkate -- nanu tarhīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8003_1: satyapi tajjanye duḥkhe balavadveṣābhāvena balavadveṣaviṣayaduḥkhājanakatvajñānasya satvāditi cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8004: kasya cidalasāderyāgādyanuṣṭhānajanyaduḥkhepi balavadveṣasya satvena bavadveṣa 2 viṣayaduḥkhānanundhitvena 3 viśiṣṭasya vidhipratyayārthasya bādhitatayā vidhānānupapatteḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8010: nanu -- taṃ prati vidhyayoge 'pi puruṣāntaraṃ prati kālāntare taṃ pratyeva vā vidhānopapattiriti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8014: na ca balavatvamutkaṭatvaṃ tacca jātiviśeṣa iti yuktam /

GSP29vytrkt2u:8033: yadi ca tasya tatropādhitvaṃ tarhyananugama eva /

GSP29vytrkt2u:8051_2: iṣṭāsādhanatvaṃ maṇyādyuktarītyā caturdhā na viśeṣaṇīyamiti' ityadhikam -ga.rā.su.
GSP29vytrkt2u:8062: tena tavdyākhyānābhimataṃ nanu tarhi balavadityādinoktaṃ cuturthaviśeṣaṇaṃ dhyeyam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8075: prakṛte ceṣṭasādhanatvasya liṅādinā pratīyamānatvāttadarthakatvakalpanameva tasya yuktamitibhāvenāha -- phalapadeti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8078: tarhi nairarthakyameva liṅgādeḥ syādityata āha -- ākhyāteti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8089_0: caturthe tṛtīyapāde“codanāyāṃ phalāśruteḥ karmamātraṃ pratīyeta na hyaśabdaṃ pratīyate“iti
GSP29vytrkt2u:8089_1: pañcamedhikaraṇe viśvajitā yajetetyādi viśvajidādināmakayāgeṣu aśrutaphaleṣu phalamastyuta
GSP29vytrkt2u:8089_2: neti saṃdehe svargādirūpādṛṣṭaphalasya śabdapramāṇakatvādiha ca svargādibodhakaśabdābhāvāt
GSP29vytrkt2u:8089_8: tadekaṃ phalamevaṃ 1 rūpamiti viśiṣyānirṇayāt punaḥ sarvārthatvameveti prāpta svargasya
GSP29vytrkt2u:8089_9: duḥkhāsaṃbhinnasukharūpatayā sarvābhilaṣitatvāt svarge evādhyāhāreṇa kalpya iti
GSP29vytrkt2u:8091: tathā ca tatra bhāvyatayeṣṭasāmānyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāmeva svargarūpeṣṭaviśeṣakalpanaṃ yatkṛtaṃ tacca na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8106: nanu tathāpīṣṭasādhanatvaṃ takṣakacūḍāmaṇyāharaṇādāvapravṛtyarthaṃ kṛtisādhyatvenāvaśyaṃ viśeṣaṇīyamiti cenna /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8112: takṣakacūḍāmaṇyāharaṇādikaṃ ca takṣakadaṃśana 3 bhītyā kṛtyasādhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8119: tadasādhyatvajñānadaśāyāṃ tu 2 kṛtyā phalaṃ sādhayiṣyāmīti kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikāyāḥ phalecchāyā
GSP29vytrkt2u:8121: na hi sādhane kṛtyasādhyatvena jñāte phale kṛtisādhyatvaṃ jñātuṃ śakyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8122: na ca phalasya kṛtisādhyatvājñāne phale tatprakārikecchāyuktā /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8123: kṛtisādhyatvaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ vā kāryatājñānaṃ vā pravartakamiti mate 'pi hi uktā phalecchā'vaśyakī /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8128: sādhanasya kṛtyasādhyatvajñānakāle phalecchāyā abhāva eva kuta iti cet /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8130: astvevaṃ tathāpi phalecchāyā āvaśyakatvameva kuta ityataḥ pratijñāpūrvaṃ hetumāha -- kṛtisādhyatveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8143_0: dṛśyate hi phalaṃ daivādanyakṛtito 'pi vā mama sidhyatvitīcchāyāṃ tvaduktaviśiṣṭeṣṭasādhanatvajñāne
GSP29vytrkt2u:8143_1: kṛtisādhyatvajñāne ca satyapi phalaṃ kṛtyāsādhayiṣyāmītīcchābhāvena pravṛtyabhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8144: nanvevaṃ kriyāyāḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānamapi tvayāpi pravartakatvena svīkṛtamiti cet / satyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8149: spaṣṭārthaṃ jñānadvaye satītyasya ghaṭanārthaṃ veti dhyeyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8162: uktarūpaphalecchāṃ prati hetutvena phale kṛtisādhyatvajñānasyāṅgīkṛtatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8164: viditābhiprāyaḥ“liṅgādyarthastu iṣṭāsādhanatvameve“ti karmanirṇayavākyaṃ hṛdi kṛtvā pariharati --satyamityādinā //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8165: kena tarhi kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ kuto liṅgādijanyaṃ netyata āha -- kriyāyā iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8171: kriyāyāḥ kṛtisādhyatvasya kṛtyanvayavyatirekagamyatvena tatra liṅ 1 śakte rakalpanāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8172: na hi yajetetiśabdaḥ svargakāmasya yāgaḥ śakya ityāha /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8176: kiṃ ca kṛtisādhyatve satīṣṭasādhanatvaṃ na liṅarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8179_1: liṅāradyartha ityucyate tathaiva pratītibalātkṛtisādhyatvamapi liṅgādyartha ityucyatāmityata āha -- nahīti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8184: evaṃ tarhi sarvepi kuto na pravartante kuto vā sarve 'pi na nivartante ityata āha -- tatra śakta iti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8189: yadyapi - ekasya pākāderyaṃ prati sādhyatvaṃ taṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:8191: kāṣṭhādirūpasvakāraṇaṃ prati sādhyatvamodanādi 4 kāryaṃ prati sādhanatvamaviruddham/
GSP29vytrkt2u:8205: asiddhatākāle sādhyatvasya siddhatvadaśāyāṃ sādhanatvasya ca saṃbhavāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8210_0: ādyasya caturthapāde“nāmadheye guṇaśruteḥ syādvidhānamiti cedi“ti pañcame 'dhikaraṇe
GSP29vytrkt2u:8210_2: saṃśaye 3 yajeteti śrutyā 4 khyātopāttaprayatnāparaparyāyabhāvanayā yāgasya prakṛtipratyasamabhivyāhārabalenakarmatva
GSP29vytrkt2u:8210_4: peyarūpavājena yāgaṃ kuryādityanvayasya yugapadeva saṃbhavādguṇavidhipara iti prāpte
GSP29vytrkt2u:8210_7: bodhamupetya phalānvaya eva vācyaḥ vājapeyapadaṃ tu nāmadheyamiti siddhāntitam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8212: 1.tu vi-naṃ.u. 2.tra kiṃ vā-naṃ.u. 3.ye yāya -u. e 4.tyākhyā naṃ.u. 5.sthala catuṣṭaye karaṇa ityevāsti - naṃ. u. e.
GSP29vytrkt2u:8215: api ca na kṛtisādhyatvena jñānamātraṃ pravartakam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8219: kiṃ tvayaṃ yāgo matkṛtisādhyo matkṛtiṃ vināsatvāt ityanumānena 1 /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8222: na ca pravartakajñānajanakasya liṅgasya śabdenopasthāpanācchābdatvamiti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8223_2: ityanumānenaiva sarvasya siddhyā liṅa ākhyātāntaravatkṛtirevārtho na tviṣṭasādhanatvamapītyāpatteḥ //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
GSP29vytrkt2u:8225: kṛtisādhyatveṣṭasādhanatvayorupasthāpakatvāyogāt na viśiṣṭaṃ viṅādividhipratyayārthopi tu tadupasthiteranyataḥ siddhatvānna liṅgādestadarthakatvamityāha -- api ceti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8229: 1.naiva / evaṃ ca liṅā kṛtisādhye yāge svargasādhanatvenoktemānāntareṇa ca svakṛtacisādhyatve buddhe svargaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti phalecchāyāṃ ca satyāṃ yāge cikīrṣākṛtī bhavataḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8240: manmate tu svakṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ na pravartakamiti nānumānāpekṣā / yāge
GSP29vytrkt2u:8241: svargasādhanatvena jñāte svasyoktāyāṃ svargecchāyāṃ ca satyāṃ pravṛttāvavatilambāt /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8254: “vājapeyena svārājyakāmo yajete“tyādau yaji 1 noktayāgasya uddeśyatvānuvādyatvaprādhānyarūpa dharmatrayaṃ,
GSP29vytrkt2u:8256: parasparaviruddhamuddeśyatvādidharmatrayasya yathākramupādeyatvādidharmatrayapratidvandvitvādviruddhaṃ yatrikadvayaṃ tasya yāge āpātācceti kiṃ cetyādinoktahetvuvādaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8259: jijñāsādhikaraṇe“kāryatā ca na kācitsyā“dityādiparakīyakāryatākhaṇḍanaprakaraṇe“tadiṣṭaṃ sādhanaṃ tathā“ityupasaṃhāravākyavyākhyāvasare sudhāyāmuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8269: kṛtisādhyeṣṭasādhanatāyāḥ kāryatā 1 paryāyatvāditi niṣṇutatvanirṇayaṭīkāyā ca saha virodha iti vācyam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8272: ata eva karmanirṇaye liṅādyarthastviṣṭasādhanatvameveti liṅādesttviṣṭasādhanatārthatvenaiva kṛtārthatvamiti coktam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8277: na ca siddher'thache vākyasya prāmāṇyābhāvādityādiprakaraṇena 2 cārthāpattiḥ anupapattyabhāvādityetavdyākhyānarūpayetyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8300_0: kṛtisādhyatvasya liṅādyarthatvābhāvena tajjñānajanakasya kasya cidapi śabdasyābhāvādeva
GSP29vytrkt2u:8304: liṅādinā pravṛttikāraṇamiṣṭasādhanatājñānameva jāyate na tu kṛtisādhyatājñānapītyetadapītyarthaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8307: liṅādiśabdādiṣṭasādhanatāmeva jñātvā pravartata iti tatvanirṇayavākyārtha iti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8308: etena -- karmanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ kṛtisādhyatvaṃ pravartakajñānakoṭau na praveśitam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8309: tatvanirṇayaṭīkāyāṃ tu pravartakajñānaviṣayatābhimatakāryatākoṭau kṛtisādhyatvasya praveśāttasyāpi pravartakajñānaviṣayakauṭau praveśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8317_0: yadvā śabdajanyamiṣṭasādhanatvajñānameva pravartakaṃ mānāntarajanyaṃ yāgādeḥ kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:8317_1: tu phalaṃ kṛtyā sādhayiṣyāmīti kṛtisādhyatvaprakārikā yāvaśyakī phalecchā tadutpādanopakṣīṇam /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8319: tathā ca sudhā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya sākṣādupayoganiṣedhikā nirṇayaṭīke tu paraṃparopayogapare itina virodhaḥ //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8321: takṣakacaḍūmaṇyāharaṇādau tu mānāntarajanyaṃ kṛtyasādhyatvajñānaṃ pratibandhakamiti kṛtisādhyatvajñānaṃ pratabandhakanirāsāpekṣaṇim /
GSP29vytrkt2u:8325: adhunā kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya sākṣātpravṛttihetutvaṃ na kvāpyabhimatamityupetya virodhaṃ prakārāntareṇa nirāha -- yadveti //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8333_1: kṛtisādhyatvajñānasya vā kṛtisādhyatvaprakārakaphalecchāya vā vidhaṭaneneti vācyamiti
GSP29vytrkt2u:8341: nirṇayaṭīke tu upayogamātrāstitvapare iti na virodha ityāhuḥ//
GSP29vytrkt2u:8344: sā ca sādhanaviṣayaka 1 kṛtiṃ prati kiñcidantaritāṣa'pi svavirodhivyāpārānantaritā pravṛttiheturiti tvayāpi svīkāryam //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8347: nanu -- yaduktaṃ prākphalecchāyāṃ sādhane cikārṣākṛtī bhavata iti,
GSP29vytrkt2u:8349_0: sādhanacikīrṣayā vyavahitā satī phaleccha kathaṃ sādhanagocarakṛtiṃ pratihetuḥ syādityāśaṅkāṃ
GSP29vytrkt2u:8349_1: pariharan ṭīkādyavirodhokterupayogaṃ ca vivakṣuḥ pravṛttihetuṃ viṣkṛṣya darśayati -- tasmāditi //
GSP29vytrkt2u:8361: -- jñāte rāgadveṣau tu svarūpasantau hetū bālasyādyapravṛttāviṣṭasādhanatājñānaṃ tu jīvanādṛṣṭabalena janmāntarīyasaṃskārāditi sarvaṃ sustham //
